author: mwomack
msg: Removed test case for varia.NDCMatchFilter since the filter was removed.

author: mwomack
msg: Removed.  This class was added for 1.3, and with the creation of the o.a.log4j.filters package, I would prefer developers use the version implemented there.

author: mwomack
msg: Added LevelRangeFilter.java, copied functionality from varia version.
Added MessageMatchFilter.java to match string values in event messages.
Added SetLocationInfoFilter to optimize setting of location info for appenders like SocketAppender.  Included javadoc explanation as to when this filter should be used.
